dialog.title: Enable Competitor Analysis?
dialog.description: Enhance your roadmap with insights from competitor products

whatItDoes.title: What competitor analysis does:
whatItDoes.item1: Identifies 3-5 main competitors based on your project type
whatItDoes.item2: Searches app stores, forums, and social media for user feedback and pain points
whatItDoes.item3: Suggests features that address gaps in competitor products

privacy.title: Web searches will be performed
privacy.description: This feature will perform web searches to gather competitor information. Your project name and type will be used in search queries. No code or sensitive data is shared.

optional: You can generate a roadmap without competitor analysis if you prefer. The roadmap will still be based on your project structure and best practices.
